name: donetick
description: Donetick is a self-hosted to-do and task tracking application with projects, due dates, priorities, and recurring tasks. Its clean web interface is designed to make personal productivity and small team planning straightforward and private.
features: Task Management: Create, organize, and track tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion status.
Project Organization: Group related tasks into projects with progress tracking and milestone management.
Recurring Tasks: Set up repeating tasks with flexible scheduling options for daily, weekly, or custom intervals.
Priority System: Assign priority levels to tasks with visual indicators and sorting capabilities.
Due Date Tracking: Monitor upcoming deadlines with calendar views and notification reminders.
Team Collaboration: Share projects with team members and assign tasks with role-based permissions.
Progress Analytics: View productivity statistics and completion trends with visual charts and reports.
Mobile Access: Responsive web interface optimized for smartphones and tablets with offline capabilities.
Search and Filter: Find tasks quickly using full-text search and advanced filtering options.
Data Export: Export task data and project information for backup and external analysis purposes.
Custom Categories: Organize tasks with custom tags and categories for better project management.
Privacy Focused: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over personal and team productivity data.
